name: Graviton (itch) (dunkelgrau)
description:
Submission for Nokia 3310 Jam 3. Theme: On/Off

Content: The year is 2042. You are a scientist onboard the International Space Station III. It's a bit dangerous due to austerity measures. Luckily, you made the biggest breakthrough in your career - the discovery and utilization of the graviton. Now you're able to control gravity and find your way through the shabby spaceship.

Controls Nokia Like:
Up/Jump: Num8
Right: Num6
Left: Num4
Down: Num2
Switch Gravitation: Num5
Restart: Num0

Controls Keyboard:
Up/Jump: W/Space
Right: D
Left: A
Down: S
Switch Gravitation: E
Restart: R

Programming and graphics: dunkelgrau
Sound: Trix Sound Pack (https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources)
